text:
In two different accidents, 16 persons including a pilgrim party were injured here on Saturday. A minivan carrying pilgrims to Melmaruvathur rammed a median in Uthangarai along Tiruvannamalai-Krishnagiri national highway. Six passengers were injured.

In another accident, a government bus rammed a tree in Shoolagiri, critically injuring 10 passengers on Saturday. The accident occurred when the driver of the bus carrying 20 passengers from Hosur reportedly faced a glitch in the steering wheel. The injured were rushed to Hosur Government Hospital.
title: 16 injured in accidents
